text: > Israel News Opinion Isaac Herzog Details His 10-point Plan for Israeli-Palestinian Peace Israeli opposition leader's plan: Sides will agree on decade of calm, during which time West Bank will be a violence and incitement-free zone; settlement construction outside blocs will be frozen, with more powers to Palestinians â€“ only then negotiations.
